about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm Bulşah Keçici — a Data Scientist and Computer Engineer based in Ankara. I specialize in AI-driven analytics, intelligent automation, and modern web systems. My work focuses on building data pipelines, AI models, and digital tools that transform ideas into measurable results.
